detail_desc: High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, seam with a drawstring at the waist and a slit centre front. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, seam with a drawstring at the waist and a slit centre front. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a linen blend with a collar, deep V-neck and decorative diagonal buttoning down the front. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Lightweight popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with a small peak at the front and a concealed elastic drawstring at the back, a zip at the top and a zipped front pocket. Long sleeves with ventilating holes under the arms and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined. The popover jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Two macramé bracelets and four elastic bracelets with wooden and stone beads.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with embroidery and wide shoulder straps with pin-tucks. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and wide band with pin-tucks under the bust and a skirt with pleats to create width.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with embroidery and wide shoulder straps with pin-tucks. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and wide band with pin-tucks under the bust and a skirt with pleats to create width.
Short, V-neck dress in airy cotton with short butterfly sleeves, a button placket and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Short top in an airy weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and a small frill trim a the top.
Short top in an airy weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and a small frill trim a the top.
Elastic bracelets with beads made from semi-precious stones, metal, glass and wood.
Bracelets in various designs. Four elastic bracelets with beads and one in braided fabric with an adjustable length.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Velour mules with pointed toes and a decorative twisted detail at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Calf-length dress in soft, patterned satin in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut that widens at the hem. Lined at the top.
Calf-length dress in soft, patterned satin in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut that widens at the hem. Lined at the top.

Short tunic in a cool, slightly stretchy weave with a discreet sheen. Collar, deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seams to the hem with decorative gathers to create volume.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, 3/4-length, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an elasticated waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, 3/4-length, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an elasticated waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Pyjama bottoms in supersoft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and 3/4-length straight legs with elasticated lace trims at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped, sleeveless top in sturdy, double-layered jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and soft side support.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist. The bikers have a light sculpting effect on the tummy and thighs and push-up effect on the bum with the help of mesh reinforcements and rounded seams.
Shaping bikers in sturdy mesh with a high waist, lined gusset and legs. Light sculpting effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Round earrings in snakeskin-patterned metal. Length 5 cm.
Metal earrings decorated with plastic and glass beads. Size approx. 3x3 cm.
Long earrings in plastic and metal. Length 6.5 cm.
Long metal earrings decorated with glass beads and resin pendants. Length 9.5 cm.
Heart-shaped earrings in metal and resin. Length 6 cm.
Earrings in textured metal. Length 6.3 cm.
Sunglasses with patterned plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Metal hoop earrings with plastic beads. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in different designs. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm, 47-55 cm, 51.5-59 cm.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and ties at the neckline and short sleeves with an opening and covered button.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and ties at the neckline and short sleeves with an opening and covered button.
Knee-length wrap dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with short sleeves, ties at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft, double-weave organic cotton with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces.

Jumpsuit woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with embroidery on the front and legs. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, textured jersey with a lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt with lace bands at the hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, textured jersey with a lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt with lace bands at the hem.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, short sleeves and a flared skirt.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, short sleeves and a flared skirt.

Short top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight jersey with crossover straps at the top of the back. Slightly longer at the back.

Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and frills at the back.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey with a reversible sequin motif.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved top, skirt with straps, pair of leggings and a hairband in cotton. Top in jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Skirt in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons and a lace trim at the hem. Double-layered hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a romper suit and sun hat in airy, patterned organic cotton poplin. Romper suit with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hems and narrow shoulder straps. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y). Double-layered sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4 cm.

Short jacket in felted fabric containing some wool with a pile-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs, and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides. Pile lining.
Block-coloured socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed, fold-down shaft.
Block-coloured socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed, fold-down shaft.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a boat neck and buttons on the shoulders.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
